snippet: The City University of New York announced on Tuesday a new residency program that will provide choreographers with rehearsal and performance space at the university’s campuses across the five boroughs.
abstract: The City University of New York announced on Tuesday a new residency program that will provide choreographers with rehearsal and performance space at the university’s campuses across the five boroughs.

headline.main: City University of New York Announces Dance Initiative
headline.print_headline: CUNY to Offer Dance Rehearsal Space
